app.footer: I'm a slacker Â©{{year}} Created by Hehehe

viewConfig.title: View Configuration
viewConfig.bookSourceTooltip: Only one can be selected, current options: 1, 2, 3, recommended default source is 3
viewConfig.downloadPathTooltip: Absolute or relative path (For Windows, use / or \ instead of \)
viewConfig.logLevelTooltip: Default is error (panic fatal error warn info debug trace)
viewConfig.crawlThreadsTooltip: -1 means automatic setting, setting too high may trigger anti-crawling mechanisms
viewConfig.maxRetriesTooltip: For chapters that fail on first download attempt
viewConfig.chatbotSupportInfo: Note: The current configuration only supports Ollama, switching models may result in a download of the
viewConfig.modelTooltip: Ollama supports a list of models available on https://ollama.com/library

downloadNovel.downloadComplete: '{{bookName}}' download complete! Output path: {{outputPath}} Time taken: {{takeTime}} seconds
downloadNovel.downloadFailure: Failed to download '{{bookName}}', please try again later
downloadNovel.storageWarning: Unable to store search results, storage may be full
downloadNovel.searchFailure: Search failed, please try again later

usageInfo.title: fy-novel Usage Information
usageInfo.disclaimerContent: This program is the author's Go language learning practice project. Any issues arising from its use are not related to the author!!!
usageInfo.notesContent: Some sources do not support proxy access!!!

chatbot.initializationDescription: Ollama needs to be initialized before use. This may take a few minutes.
chatbot.dockerDescription: This chatbot requires Docker to be installed and running on your local machine. Please ensure Docker is set up before using this feature.
chatbot.title: Chatbot
chatbot.invalidResponse: Chatbot API response is missing or invalid.
chatbot.apiError: Sorry, the chatbot encountered an issue: {{error}}
chatbot.networkError: Sorry, there was a network connection problem. Please check your internet connection and try again.
chatbot.unknownError: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
chatbot.errorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
chatbot.initModalContent: Ollama needs to be initialized before chatting. Do you want to initialize now?
chatbot.modelChangeWarning: Changing the model may require downloading new model files, which could be a time-consuming operation. Do you want to continue?
chatbot.modelResetWarning: You are about to reset the current model. This may help if the previous change was interrupted. Do you want to continue?
chatbot.prerequisiteDescription: To use this chatbot, you need to meet the following requirements:
chatbot.prerequisiteOllama: Ability to pull the ollama/ollama image
chatbot.prerequisiteWarning: If you haven't met these conditions, please complete the relevant setup first.
